text.div:
This value set includes codes based on the following rules:

  • Include codes from http://loinc.org where CLASSTYPE = 4
  • Include codes from http://loinc.org where CLASSTYPE = 2
  • Include codes from http://loinc.org where CLASS = PANEL.NEONAT

name: USCoreSurveyCodes
title: US Core Survey Codes
description: This value set includes screening and assessment panel codes in LOINC (Refer to [Appendix A](https://loinc.org/kb/users-guide/loinc-database-structure/) of LOINC Users' Guide).
